H3.text: how many seasons of the glades were made. four

A4.text: A total of 49 episodes of The Glades were aired over four seasons.

A5.text: A&E canceled the series after its season-four finale, effectively ending the series on a cliffhanger of Longworth being shot, minutes before his wedding, and left trying to reach his phone.
